requirements.description: The Mixpanel Privacy Statement governs Mixpanel's tracking and use of information collected about Customer on Mixpanel Sites
The Mixpanel Privacy Statement excludes information Mixpanel processes on Customer's behalf in providing the Application Services
Customer must provide its own privacy statement or notice to its End Users

Customer can collect registration and other information about Customer through Mixpanel Sites only if providing all required disclosures to and obtaining all required consents from Customer's employees and/or agents

type.summary: Customer's Responsibility for Disclosure and Consent

requirements.description: Mixpanel can collect registration and other information about Customer as Mixpanel's customer through Mixpanel Sites

type.summary: Mixpanel's Right to Collect Customer Information
